procurement and construction services to deliver electrical, environmental, and civil work programs.  Students will have exposure to power line and electrical substation projects.  Leadership and communication skills will be developed to instil confidence in the candidateâ€™s abilities.  In addition, there will be opportunities to develop working relationships with contractors, suppliers and monitor, control and direct projects and programs during the execution phase under the direction of a Senior Project Manager.Co-ordinate activities with stakeholders.Assist in resolving issues through and substation power systems.Gain the knowledge necessary to develop project plans.Experience with the management processes used to design, procure and construct power systems for both Transmission
